findings.title: Inconsistency Between Document and Implementation
findings.description: There is a misleading comment embedded among lines of solidity code, which brings unnecessary hurdles to understand and/or maintain the software.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: The privileged 'owner' account has critical roles in governing and regulating system-wide operations, including parameter setting and token adjustment, and has the privilege to control or govern the flow of assets managed by this protocol.
